jfilesyslib

Class Mounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • jfilesyslib.Mounter

  • public final class Mounter
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this class to mount your virtual file system.
    Author:
    Marc Miltenberger

      • unmount

        public static boolean unmount(java.io.File mountPath)
        Unmounts the specified mount path.
        You should use the filesystem overloading since beforeUnmounting() and afterUnmounting() are not being called.
        Parameters:
        mountpath - the mount path
        Returns:
        true if the unmounting process has completed successfully
